Did you know baklava comes from Turkey?
Today, I'm gonna take you on a culinary journey through baklava.
Turks have a sweet tooth and arguably, baklava is their favorite dessert.
Well, for starters, baklava needs 40 layers of phyllo dough.
Each layer should be so thin that it's see-through.
Gaziantep pistachios are savored for their unique taste.
The butter is 99.9 percent pure and the syrup is made with sugar.
Discover all this and more in Turkey, home of baklava.
